bill.title: Relating To Housing.
bill.description: Increases the deadline for a county council to take action on an affordable housing project's application from forty-five days to an unspecified number of days after receipt of the proposed project's preliminary plans and specifications from the Hawaii housing finance and development corporation. Effective 7/1/3000. (HD2)

history.action: Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-08-23 9:30AM in conference room 312 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee recommends that the measure pass with amendments, for recommittal for further consideration. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashimoto, Aiu, Kila, Kitagawa, Marten, Onishi, Todd, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 291) as amended in HD 1, recommending recommittal to HSG for further consideration.
Recommitted to HSG as amended in HD 1 with none voting no and none excused.
Re-referred to HSG, FIN, referral sheet 14
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Wednesday, 02-15-23 9:30AM in House conference room 312 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashimoto, Aiu, Kila, Kitagawa, Marten, Onishi, Todd, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 625) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 2 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Marten excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-24-23 10:00AM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Kitagawa, Aiu, Chun, Kahaloa, Kobayashi, Lamosao, Morikawa, Nishimoto, Poepoe, Takenouchi, Alcos, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Cochran, Kila; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Garrett.
